headline: Berkshire Hathaway Is Prepared For A Recession And That's When Fortunes Are Made
summary: Tariffs have caused lasting damage to the U.S. economy. Read why I plan to buy Berkshire Hathaway and select Magnificent 7 stocks during the next downturn.

headline: Is a Big Oil Megamerger Brewing? Exxon, Chevron, and Others Are Eyeing This Oil Stock.
summary: BP's underperformance and strategy shifts have made it a potential takeover target.  Shell, Chevron, Exxon, TotalEnergies, and others have looked into acquiring the oil company.  Chevron (NYSE: CVX) followed with a megadeal of its own, agreeing to buy Hess for $60 billion in a deal it hopes to close this summer.

headline: Trump’s Thirst for Cheap Oil Irks an Industry He Loves to Praise
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Terrel Hardin was at a diner along Route 66 in western Oklahoma when his phone rang with bad news: The engine on one of his oil rigs had broken. headline: Huge Pension Halves Alibaba Stake. It Sold Altria, Chevron, and Lockheed Stock.
summary: The New York State Common Retirement Fund cut positions in Alibaba, Altria, Chevron, and Lockheed Martin in the first quarter.

headline: Invesco Growth And Income Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Reversing a trend in Q4, value stocks outperformed growth in Q1 as the Russell 1000 Value Index returned 2.14% and the Russell 1000 Growth Index returned -9.97%.
